divs: Sighting Detailslooked out at about 7:30 getting dark. I saw one object up treetop level. then I saw another one yellow in color traveling to my right. I let it go then I thought I should look back I then was looking up at a bright star. Then from my left a white object moved very fast over the star, it was blinking on and off. It then was gone. This lasted in all about 45 minutes.I did check off and on for several hours. No more activity.I see them all the time. I just want this on record. I am not crazy.
Summary: I saw three different objects. one yellow close to ground,one in tree, and one going accross very very fast.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around January 21st 2009
